vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Καιάφας (T, Καϊ-), -α ὁ,
Caiaphas (on the name, see Exp. Times, x, 185): Mat.26:3, 57, Luk.3:2, Jhn.11:4 18:13-14, 24 18:28 Act.4:6.†
Καΐφας, for Καιάφας, which see: Luk.3:2 (L)
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.26.3
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
該亞法 这个陽性專有名詞在亞蘭文的意思是 "合宜得體"
猶太人的大祭司,在定罪耶穌一案是關鍵角色.
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
该亚法 这个阳性专有名词在亚兰文的意思是 "合宜得体"
犹太人的大祭司,在定罪耶稣一案是关键角色.

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Jhn.18.13;
unnamed daughter of: Annas (G0452); married to Caiaphas (G2533)
